title: october 20: cuckoo for coco
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia revisits a recent favorite film: Pixar’s Coco. If you’re wondering why Coco counts as history, well, listen to the pod and find out! Later, Maia takes on a musical tragedy and a band we will never forget. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
